videos.description: Isaac Haas gets the ball down low and draws the foul on the two-handed jam for the Boilermakers.
videos.headline: Purdue's Haas gets the and-1 dunk

videos.description: Louisville's Deng Adel reaches out for the steal and throws down the jam with one hand.
videos.headline: Adel steal leads to big one-handed dunk for Cards

videos.description: Carsen Edwards gets the ball after the steal and races to the rim for the bucket.
videos.headline: Edwards takes it full speed for the Purdue layup

videos.description: Ryan Cline pulls up for the jump shot to give Purdue a 23-22 lead over the Cardinals before halftime.
videos.headline: Cline jumper gives Purdue lead before half

videos.description: Louisville interim head coach David Padgett says his offense can get going if it keeps being aggressive down low as the Cardinals enter the half down 22-21 to Purdue.
videos.headline: Padgett: 'We need to keep attacking the rim'

videos.description: Deng Adel finds pace outside for the 3-pointer on the fast-break assist by Quentin Snider for Louisville.
videos.headline: Adel left open for 3 on fast-break

videos.description: Louisville's Malik Williams commits a foul on Purdue's Vincent Edwards and then the two get face-to-face under the rim.
videos.headline: Williams and Edwards have to be separated

videos.description: Vincent Edwards makes a subtle move and knocks down a 3-pointer to put Purdue back on top 37-36.
videos.headline: Purdue's Edwards pulls up for 3

videos.description: Nojel Eastern just misses out on a fast-break two-handed jam for the Boilermakers.
videos.headline: Purdue misses open dunk

videos.description: Quentin Snider helps Louisville get back within one with a 3-pointer.
videos.headline: Snider cuts Purdue's lead with 3-pointer

videos.description: Deng Adel knocks down a jumper with little time left on the shot clock to give Louisville a narrow lead.
videos.headline: Adel nails stepback jumper for Cards

videos.description: Vincent Edwards gets inside and finds space for the layup to put the Boilermakers up four over Louisville.
videos.headline: Edwards cuts inside for the layup

videos.description: Matt Haarms steps up to the quick attempt from Quentin Snider and gets the big block to ice the game for Purdue.
videos.headline: Haarms comes up big with block for Purdue

videos.description: Purdue's Dakota Mathias thinks his team learned from their disappointing trip to the Bahamas and showed that in their win over Louisville at home.
videos.headline: Mathias: 'We matured a lot this game'
